checklist.title: High Rank Florges
checklist.notes: Florges reaches several bulkpoints with maximum Defense spreads such as 0/15/1, but maximum stat product appears more beneficial overall. Slight Attack weight should also be a consideration since Florges occupies a packed Attack stat tier, and striking first with Chilling Water can be vital to reduce damage.

checklist.title: High Rank Florges
checklist.notes: Florges reaches several bulkpoints with maximum Defense spreads such as 0/15/1, but maximum stat product appears more beneficial overall. checklist.title: High IV Florges
checklist.notes: Florges has loose IV requirements for Master League. If given the option, a lower HP IV is typically preferred over lower Defense or Attack.
